projects.title: MILP BESS Optimizer
projects.description: Production-grade optimization engine for multi-GW BESS deployment. Architected end-to-end system: data ingestion, probabilistic forecasting, MILP scheduling, and post-processing for trading desk.

details.problem: Complex energy trading optimization for large-scale battery systems
details.solution: End-to-end MILP optimization with real-time data integration

projects.title: Vision Transformer Navigation
projects.description: Solved autonomous navigation in GPS-denied environments using Vision Transformers and optimized SLAM. Achieved state-of-the-art 18% accuracy improvement over existing benchmarks.

details.problem: Autonomous navigation without GPS in complex environments
details.solution: Vision Transformer-based SLAM with optimized feature extraction

projects.title: Multi-Agent Airspace Pricing
projects.description: Groundbreaking MARL system for autonomous airspace management and pricing. Achieved 40% throughput increase while maintaining strict safety protocols through custom evaluation framework.

details.problem: Optimizing airspace utilization with autonomous pricing
details.solution: Multi-agent reinforcement learning with custom evaluation metrics

projects.title: Marine BESS Optimizer
projects.description: Scheduling algorithm optimizing 100+ MW vessel chargers at UK ports. Ensures port power compliance while maximizing utilization and revenue.

details.problem: Port power compliance while maximizing vessel charging revenue
details.solution: Real-time scheduling algorithm with constraint optimization
